Hariri-Bassil meeting: limited positive, "no agreement yet"
07 Nov 2019, 08:11 by Lebanon 24
Reuters quoted sources close to Prime Minister Saad Hariri as saying that his meeting with Minister Gebran Bassil was positive, during which they discussed all the ideas that would lead the country out of the difficult economic crisis, and that "contacts will remain open with Basil and the rest of the parties in the coming hours." In order to find the best possible solutions to the economic and financial difficulties and respond to the demands of the demonstrators. " In this context, reliable sources familiar with the atmosphere of the meeting told the "Republic" that the positive exists that in terms of holding the meeting and the start of talk between the parties, and in terms of discussing the exits of the crisis situation economically and financially, as well as the level of popular movement that imposed itself No longer can anyone ignore it. The sources added: Here lies the ceiling of positivity, but in the government part and with regard to the mandate and the new government, has not been reached in the search on these matters to reach consensus so far, or rather to the ends translate this consensus. If this is possible, the date of the binding parliamentary consultations that the President of the Republic is supposed to invite will be determined immediately, especially since Bassil, in his meetings with Prime Minister Hariri, speaks not only in his personal name as President of the Free Patriotic Movement, but also on behalf of the President of the Republic. The sources pointed out that the contacts will be completed, and we must wait for the next days between now and the end of the week, and whether this period will bring with them consensus on the set of addresses that ultimately lead to the commissioning of consultancy, and then authoring. In response to a question about waving Prime Minister Hariri can be reluctant to run for the next prime minister, the sources said that Hariri does not threaten or threaten, but he believes that if the situation requires a figure to form a government in which the conditions of running the stage with an integrated team, he is ready to give it This opportunity.
